content.prompt: Mildred’s account in line 21 (“Well . . . here it is”) of her interaction with Muriel most clearly serves to

choices.label: offer an example of the ongoing tension among several of the characters
build suspense before the resolution of a crucial misconception
provide another perspective on an important episode in Richard’s past
supply context that helps explain the behavior for which Richard is being punished

skill.text: Skill 3.E: Explain the function of a significant event or related set of significant events in a plot.
